Subject: Eclipse, a new form. And Wolveritron, becoming a Transmetal
Message-ID: <8t5b8d+tod2@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "David Torrey" <Dachande85@...>

::Eclipse/Wolveritron::

     They had met up in the forest and were travelling back to the 
CF. 
     Just at that moment something strange happened to Eclipse. He 
started to have shooting pains within himself. Wolveritron grabbed 
him to hold him up and the pain was transfered. They both felt the 
pain of whatever this was.
     A blast of energy was shot out from Eclipse, and Wolveritron 
went flying. When wolveritron hit he was glowing white, and getting a 
new form. He was becoming Transmetal. Then he stood there, in his 
regal new form. A cloak coming off of his right shoulder. He now had 
a face plate. He tested his claws. Two came out normally, then a 
third, in the middle popped out and it was very long, almost a saber. 
He tried the other one, the same happened. He went to beast mode, now 
he was a TM Wolverine, which he thought was very cool. He could 
extend his beast mode claws to about twelve inches. Then he 
remembered Eclipse. He went looking for him.
     Eclipse was lying in a shallow ditch, one that he made himself 
from the blast. Wolveritron transformed to Robot mode and started 
walking down the ditch. It was still smoldering, and he couldn't see. 
Then the Sliver Wolf jumped out at him. He looked at Wolveritron with 
intelligent eyes. Then he transformed, to a werewolf form. And spoke.
     "Hey, Wolveritron," He said, helping the startled bot up. "It's 
me, Eclipse, great new form, don't you think?"
     Wolveritron stood in amazement at this new Silver Wolf that is 
Eclipse.
